QuestData.Title: Dread Menders
QuestData.Description:
The ambercasters are among the highest castes of mantid society. Through their magic, they can mend and form amber to their will, allowing hastened recovery of the mantid's forces after a battle.
They are strategic targets, and we should seek them out.
Care to join us?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Mantid ambercasters in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
